original_text: And he that is eight days old shall be circumcised among you, every man child in your generations, he that is born in the house, or bought with money of any stranger, which is not of thy seed.
korean_text: 너희의 대대로 모든 남자는 집에서 난 자나 또는 너희 자손이 아니라 이방 사람에게서 돈으로 산 자를 막론하고 난 지 팔 일 만에 할례를 받을 것이라

sentences.original_text: And he that is eight days old
every man child in your generations
he that is born in the house
or bought with money of any stranger
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 어떤 이방인의 돈으로 산 자나

sentences.original_text: which is not of thy seed
